provides.title: Architecture Overview
provides.excerpt: This document provides a high-level overview of the architecture of the Inference Gateway. The Inference-Gateway is designed to be modular and extensible, allowing easy integration of new models and providers.

provides.title: Authentication
provides.excerpt: Inference Gateway supports authentication through OpenID Connect (OIDC), allowing you to secure your API with various identity providers. This guide focuses on setting up authentication with Keycloak, a popular open-source identity and access management solution.

provides.title: Examples
provides.excerpt: This page provides examples of how to use Inference Gateway in various scenarios and environments.

provides.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Integration
provides.excerpt: The Inference Gateway supports **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** integration, enabling seamless access to external tools and data sources for Large Language Models (LLMs). This powerful feature automatically discovers and provides tools to LLMs without requiring clients to manage them individually.

provides.title: Observability
provides.excerpt: Inference Gateway provides robust observability features to help monitor and troubleshoot your deployment. These features include metrics collection, tracing, and logging capabilities that integrate with popular monitoring tools.

provides.title: Software Development Kits (SDK's)
provides.excerpt: Inference Gateway provides official SDKs for various programming languages to simplify integration with your applications. These SDKs offer typed interfaces, error handling, and convenience methods for interacting with the Inference Gateway API.

provides.title: Supported Providers
provides.excerpt: Inference Gateway provides a unified interface to interact with multiple LLM providers.

provides.title: User Interface (UI)
provides.excerpt: Inference Gateway includes an optional web-based user interface for interactively testing and exploring the various language model providers and capabilities.

deployment.title: Inference Gateway Documentation
deployment.excerpt: Inference Gateway is a proxy server designed to facilitate access to various

deployment.title: Model Context Protocol (MCP) Integration
deployment.excerpt: The Inference Gateway supports **Model Context Protocol (MCP)** integration, enabling seamless access to external tools and data sources for Large Language Models (LLMs). This powerful feature automatically discovers and provides tools to LLMs without requiring clients to manage them individually.

deployment.title: Observability
deployment.excerpt: Inference Gateway provides robust observability features to help monitor and troubleshoot your deployment. These features include metrics collection, tracing, and logging capabilities that integrate with popular monitoring tools.

deployment.title: User Interface (UI)
deployment.excerpt: Inference Gateway includes an optional web-based user interface for interactively testing and exploring the various language model providers and capabilities.

This powerful feature automatically discovers and provides tools to LLMs without requiring clients to manage them individually.

automatically.title: User Interface (UI)
automatically.excerpt: Inference Gateway includes an optional web-based user interface for interactively testing and exploring the various language model providers and capabilities.
